Package com.irurueta.navigation.indoor.position

Class RobustRangingPositionEstimator<P extends com.irurueta.geometry.Point<?>>

java.lang.Object
com.irurueta.navigation.indoor.position.RobustPositionEstimator<P,RangingReading<? extends RadioSource>,RobustRangingPositionEstimatorListener<P>>
com.irurueta.navigation.indoor.position.RobustRangingPositionEstimator<P>
Type Parameters:
P - a Point type.
Direct Known Subclasses:
RobustRangingPositionEstimator2D, RobustRangingPositionEstimator3D
public abstract class RobustRangingPositionEstimator<P extends com.irurueta.geometry.Point<?>> extends RobustPositionEstimator<P,RangingReading<? extends RadioSource>,RobustRangingPositionEstimatorListener<P>>
Base class for robust ranging position estimators using located radio sources and their ranging readings at unknown locations. These kind of estimators can be used to robustly determine the position of a given device by getting ranging readings at an unknown location of different radio sources whose locations are known. Implementations of this class should be able to detect and discard outliers in order to find the best solution.
